tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Connected - Short Film
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Watch the full stunning short CONNECTED.
Remember to view the movie in fullscreen and turn up the sound.
Set in the distant future, Connected is a story about survival and greed with a post apocalyptic wasteland as its backdrop. Survivors of an unknown disaster shuffle through a desolate landscape, as it quickly becomes clear that not everybody has the strength to survive. Copyright © 2009 Jonas Drotner Mouritsen / Jens Raunkjær Christensen
Written & directed by Jens Raunkjær Christensen & Jonas Drotner Mouritsen
Producer Hui Rose
Director of photography Niels A. Hansen
Produced with support from Danish Film Institute / Film Workshop & consultant Camilla Ebling
More Info: http://www.ov43.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: FICTION/DRAMA
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Programme consisting of a prose or verse composition, resp. one telling a story, written for or as if for performance by actors, puppets or animated

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Amazing.﻿
why is everyone are so into the end of the world. if the﻿ world is going to end, bring it on.
Unity is﻿ strength.
This﻿ movie is like Sushi: People love it or people hate it

this is obviously a low budget crap.....looks like it's made by filming school student without proper techniques and experience....i'm not saying students can't make good stuff but this﻿ is just really really bad.

Every from is an amazing picture loved it ... and﻿ where did u get the music at the credits that was creepy .... real good sound real good cinematography ... 4(on 5) thumbs up i loved it why 4 .... beacuase 5 is perfection and when something is perfect it gets boring !! :D
Interesting.﻿
the whole art﻿ direction in this film is absolutely amazing! I followed the website a few month and it was worth it.
I don't really get﻿ the message behind the video.
Totally striking,﻿

i still don't understand it. if there is co2 to o2 conversion capability, then why can't you do it to your own co2? that guy with the single tube had limited supply of o2. and if that one person was dying, then why didn't he﻿ just hook it up with that third guy?
sick﻿ concept man, very well done. the music spanish standoff music was kind of lame. but other than that homerun.
Cool concept and idea.﻿

@ajfrbxl u're right. this is really fantastic. but i can tell you one thing, really lucky that i registered and earning less than $40 daily from this web site :). you can also﻿ get it from here >-> bit.ly/S2s5Wj?=frwfsa

Hey , I'm Anshuman a 16 yr old Filmmaker/ Music composer , I believe in dreaming and my ambition is to become successful in this field , If you could just Watch * Rain * an original short film by me on my channel , currently in the video responses , Envy me not but you can make my dream come true as every like /view counts I would Just like to appeal and ask﻿ for a *thumbs up * for this just so others can see my talent , Thank you people ! <3 !
Cool, confusing, creepy. Luved﻿ it.
confusing :/ ﻿

This was a good short film great concept and idea sorta reminds me of IN TIME. For all the haters﻿ who said negative shit, get a life. If you don't like it, make something better dont waste ur time talking crap.

OMG. Everybody is so fucking negative. My idea of this film is the breath of life and death. A unborn baby need a﻿ mother for everything. But a child always want to break free...Or we need each like a breath of fresh air
damn﻿ good concept with awesome video color
ok, this was﻿ killer
That was great....﻿ keep up the good work
nice...check﻿ out my channel
It would suck to have bad﻿ breath Haha
I never understood it until the second time around... And even now... I think I've only barely grasped the true concept﻿ of it; but I really enjoyed this.
